parameter.name: customFields
parameter.description: JSON Object specifying the values for the Deal's custom fields created in the account, keys for the object are the 40-character hashes assigned for the respective custom fields

parameter.name: value
parameter.description: The value of the deal. If omitted, value will be set to 0

parameter.name: currency
parameter.description: The currency of the deal, Accepts a 3-character currency code. If omitted, will be set to the default currency of the authorized user

parameter.name: userId
parameter.description: The identifier of the user who will be marked as the owner of this deal. If omitted, the authorized user Identifier will be used

parameter.name: personId
parameter.description: The identifier of the person this deal will be associated with

parameter.name: organizationId
parameter.description: The identifier of the organization this deal will be associated with

parameter.name: stageId
parameter.description: The identifier of the stage this deal will be placed in a pipeline. If omitted, the deal will be placed in the first stage of the default pipeline

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: Specifies the status of the deal, possible values are Open, Won, Lost, Deleted, defaults to Open

parameter.name: lostReason
parameter.description: Optional message about why the deal was lost (to be used when status=lost)

parameter.name: addedTime
parameter.description: Optional creation date and time of the deal in UTC. Requires admin user API token. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

parameter.name: visibility
parameter.description: Visibility of the deal. If omitted, visibility will be set to the default visibility, possible values are 0,1,2

parameter.name: prettyOutput
parameter.description: If the prettyOutput is specified as 1, will return an indented response of the output

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: The array of fileds to be returned in the output
